mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS stuNum, edu_area FROM student s INNER JOIN users_front u ON u.id = s.`user_id` WHERE s.edu_identity = 0 AND IFNULL(u.`teacher_flag`,0) != 1 AND edu_area IS NOT NULL and edu_area != '' AND edu_school IS NOT NULL and edu_school != '' AND edu_step IS NOT NULL and edu_step != '' AND edu_year IS NOT NULL and edu_year != '' AND edu_class IS NOT NULL and edu_class != '' GROUP BY edu_area

select IFNULL(d1.item_value,'') as eduSchool,IFNULL(d2.item_value,'') as eduStep,IFNULL(count(distinct(s.id )), 0) as registerNum, sum(u.vip_flag) as paymaterCount from student s INNER JOIN users_front u on s.user_id=u.id left join company_config_proxy_org ccpo on ccpo.id= s.proxy_org_id LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d ON d.item_code = s.edu_area LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d1 ON d1.item_code = s.edu_school LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d2 ON d2.item_code = s.edu_step where 1=1 and s.school_id=#{schoolId} and s.name like '%${name}%' and s.mobile like '%${mobile}%' and u.username like '%${username}%' and s.identity_id like '%${identityId}%'
and u.id is not null
and u.id is null
and u.status = #{status}
and (u.status != 1 or u.status is null)
and u.vip_flag>=1
and u.vip_flag<=0
and u.member_status=1 and (u.member_buy_length>0 || u.member_buy_length=-1)
and date_format(s.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") >= '${startTime}' and date_format(s.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") <= '${endTime}' and province='${province}' and city= '${city}' and county= '${county}' and group_one_id= '${groupOneId}' and group_two_id= '${groupTwoId}' and ccpo.name like '%${proxyOrgName}%' and s.proxy_org_id= #{proxyOrgId} and s.edu_area= #{eduArea} and s.edu_school= #{eduSchool} and edu_identity = 0 AND IFNULL(u.`teacher_flag`,0) != 1 and edu_year = #{eduYear} and edu_class = #{eduClass} and edu_step = #{eduStep} GROUP by d1.item_code, d2.item_code order by d1.item_code, d2.item_code limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.times), 0) as times, c.item_value FROM sys_config_dict c LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d on d.id = c.parent_item_id Left JOIN edu_step_school_relation essr on essr.edu_school_code = c.item_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(swf.user_id)) AS times, swf.user_id, swf.lesson_date, s.edu_school, s.edu_area, s.edu_year FROM sys_watch_info swf LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = swf.user_id Left JOIN edu_step_school_relation essr on essr.edu_school_code = s.edu_school where 1=1 and edu_year = #{eduYear} and edu_school = #{schoolId} and edu_area = #{areaId} and essr.edu_step_new_code = #{eduStep} and lesson_date >= #{startDate} and lesson_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY ${groupBy} ) a ON
a.edu_area = c.item_code a.edu_school = c.item_code WHERE
c.dict_code = 'EDU_SCHOOL_AREA' c.dict_code = 'EDU_SCHOOL' and d.item_code = #{areaId} and essr.edu_step_new_code=#{eduStep} GROUP BY c.item_value ORDER BY c.item_code desc

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.times), 0) as times, c.item_value FROM sys_config_dict c LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d on d.id = c.parent_item_id Left JOIN edu_step_school_relation essr on essr.edu_school_code = c.item_code
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(swf.user_id) AS times, swf.user_id, swf.lesson_date, s.edu_school, s.edu_area, s.edu_year FROM sys_watch_info swf LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = swf.user_id Left JOIN edu_step_school_relation essr on essr.edu_school_code = s.edu_school where 1=1 and edu_year = #{eduYear} and edu_school = #{schoolId} and edu_area = #{areaId} and essr.edu_step_new_code = #{eduStep} and lesson_date >= #{startDate} and lesson_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY ${groupBy} ) a on
a.edu_area = c.item_code a.edu_school = c.item_code WHERE
c.dict_code = 'EDU_SCHOOL_AREA' c.dict_code = 'EDU_SCHOOL' and d.item_code = #{areaId} and essr.edu_step_new_code=#{eduStep} GROUP BY c.item_value ORDER BY c.item_code desc

select count(1) from (SELECT swi. NAME AS class_name, swi.lesson_name, s. NAME AS student_name, sf.username as user_name, s.edu_year, s.edu_class, CONCAT( s.edu_year, '级', s.edu_class, '班' ) as study_class, COUNT(swi.user_id) as times, SUM(swi.watch_time) as watch_time, ds.item_value as edu_school, dstep.item_value as edu_step, dnstep.item_value as school_type FROM sys_watch_info swi LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = swi.user_id LEFT JOIN users_front sf ON sf.id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN commodity m ON m.id = swi.commodity_id LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict ds on ds.item_code = s.edu_school LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict dstep on dstep.item_code = s.edu_step LEFT JOIN edu_step_school_relation essr on essr.edu_school_code = s.edu_school LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict dnstep on dnstep.item_code = essr.edu_step_new_code WHERE s.edu_identity=0 and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and s.edu_school = #{eduSchool} and s.edu_step = #{eduStep} and s.edu_year = #{eduYear} and s.edu_class = #{eduClass} and m.item_third_code = #{itemThirdCode} and m.id = #{commodityId} and swi.lesson_id = #{lessonId} and swi.lesson_date >= #{startTime} and swi.lesson_date <= #{endTime} and essr.edu_step_new_code = #{schoolType} and (sf.username like ${userNameOrMobile} or sf.mobile like ${userNameOrMobile}) GROUP BY swi.lesson_id, swi.user_id) a

SELECT swi. NAME AS class_name, swi.lesson_name, s. NAME AS student_name, sf.username as user_name, CONCAT( s.edu_year, '级', s.edu_class, '班' ) as study_class, COUNT(swi.user_id) as times, SUM(swi.watch_time) as watch_time, scd1.item_value as school_type, scd2.item_value as edu_school, scd3.item_value as edu_step, scd4.item_value as edu_area, s.edu_class, s.edu_year FROM sys_watch_info swi LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = swi.user_id LEFT JOIN users_front sf ON sf.id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN commodity m ON m.id = swi.commodity_id LEFT JOIN edu_step_school_relation essr on essr.edu_school_code = s.edu_school LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict scd1 on scd1.item_code = essr.edu_step_new_code LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict scd2 on scd2.item_code = s.edu_school LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict scd3 on scd3.item_code = s.edu_step LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict scd4 on scd4.item_code = s.edu_area WHERE s.edu_identity=0 and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and s.edu_school = #{eduSchool} and s.edu_step = #{eduStep} and s.edu_year = #{eduYear} and s.edu_class = #{eduClass} and m.item_third_code = #{itemThirdCode} and m.id = #{commodityId} and swi.lesson_id = #{lessonId} and swi.lesson_date >= #{startTime} and swi.lesson_date <= #{endTime} and essr.edu_step_new_code = #{schoolType} and (sf.username like ${userNameOrMobile} or sf.mobile like ${userNameOrMobile}) GROUP BY swi.lesson_id, swi.user_id limit #{pageSize}

select count(cml.id) as times, s.edu_year from student_pay_master spm LEFT JOIN commodity_product_realtion cpr on cpr.com_id = spm.commodity_id LEFT JOIN class_module_no_onsale cmno on cmno.classtype_id = cpr.product_id LEFT JOIN class_module_lesson cml on cml.module_no_id = cmno.module_no_id LEFT JOIN commodity m ON m.id = cpr.com_id LEFT JOIN student s on s.id = spm.stu_id WHERE s.edu_year > 0 and s.edu_school = #{schoolId} AND s.edu_identity = 0 and s.delete_flag = 0 AND m.live_flag =1 and DATE(spm.apply_time) >= #{startDate} and DATE(spm.apply_time) <= #{endDate} GROUP BY s.edu_year asc

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(swi.user_id)) as times,s.edu_year from sys_watch_info swi LEFT JOIN student s on s.user_id = swi.user_id where s.edu_year >0 and s.edu_school = #{schoolId} and s.edu_identity = 0 and s.delete_flag = 0 and swi.lesson_date >= #{startDate} and swi.lesson_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY s.edu_year ORDER BY s.edu_year asc
SELECT DISTINCT (edu_year) from student where delete_flag = 0 and edu_year > 0 and edu_school=#{schoolId} ORDER BY edu_year asc
